subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Blog this!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
People are what they are despite whatever education they have. I've known
and worked with people of all educational levels and the percentages of good
guys and jerks remains the same across the boards.

 Did you actually create a blog there, Frank?

Zack
